title: Grateful Dead Live at Capital Centre on 1982-09-15
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR-5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > CD-Wave (24bit output) > TLH > FLAC 2448 tagged. Transferred by Andrew F. 12/2015
source: AUD: Nakamichi CM300/CP-4 shotguns > Sony TC-D5 > Maxell XLII. Set up inside SBD perimeter area for 1st Set, mics moved onto SBD platform for 2nd Set, recording by Brian Schley.
